title: Why aren't Lucian and Vayne friends?
body:
I always wondered why is it that the two most similar champs not friends?

{{champion:67}}  and {{champion:236}}  are both Demacian monster hunting ADCs whom have lost their loved ones to the things they now hunt, Vayne hunts presumably evil mages, and Lucian hunts the undead, which overlaps with the mages seeing as how undead are created from foul dark magic, and many are evil mages themselves.

Despite this they have no interaction with each other both lore wise and in game.

EDIT: The only slight interraction they have is they share a skin line; heartseeker.

http://oi68.tinypic.com/2rlyioj.jpg

http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/Heartseeker-Vayne.jpg

While they do both pursue the same style of enemies (aka black magic style monsters) it doesn't necessarily mean they agree.

A really quick example that comes to mind that is rather popular is bleach's shinigami vs the quincy. Hunting targets are identical, but bitter rivals because of their beliefs on how to defeat them/treat them.

I actually do feel that this is what separates them, in the bilgewater story we see lucian would normally sew the openings of a dead body shut to prevent contamination (aka purifying)

Where as with vayne silver is usually considered a kill all for many mythical creatures, there is no kindness in those bolts, only a cruel strength with the intent of removing the threat rather then saving the potential victims

Because they're both moody antisocial monster hunters. They would make an amazing team, but I don't think Lucian would be able to get over himself enough to work with another (especially a strong woman, hits too close to home), and Vayne would not have time for his angst.
